MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL65 postcode area of Bryn Gwran and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:15PM due to a piece of faulty equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 4:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:25PM on 10th April 2021.
